access: You have been initiated by the grand duchess of Alkenstar or one of her agents.
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Archetype 2" pfs="Limited">[Alkenstar Agent](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=183)</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 78</row>

Outwardly dashing outlaws or silent, deadly bravos, these masters of combat and culture must hone a variety of skills to serve as secret agents and informants for the leader of Alkenstar, Grand Duchess Trietta Ricia.

<title level="3">Additional Feats</title>

This archetype has some feats at a level other than their original level.
Such feats are marked with a \*.

[Click here for the full rules on Additional Feats](/Rules.aspx?ID=1432).

name: Alkenstar Agent
search_markdown:
<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<additional-info>
<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 78</row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5)

**Access**
You have been initiated by the grand duchess of Alkenstar or one of her agents.

</additional-info>

---
